Header: UNF to meet the President today
Content: COLOMBO (News 1st) – President Maithripala Sirisena is due to meet with the representatives of the United National Front at the Presidential Secretariat this evening (November 02). Speaking to News 1st, UNP MP Ravi Karunanayaka noted that the group of MPs who took part in the meeting held on Friday (November 30) will be participating in today’s meeting as well. This meeting will focus on discussing in-depth, the issues addressed at the meeting held on Friday (November 30) and also arriving at a solution with regard to the current political situation of the country.
